enWisdom: One whose conduct is evil, his demise makes the people happy

Wisdom: مَنْ سَاءَتْ سِيرَتُهُ لَمْ يَأْمَنْ أَبَداً
enWisdom: One whose conduct is evil will never be safe at any time

Wisdom: مَنْ طَلَبَ لِلنَّاسِ الْغَوَائِلَ لَمْ يَأْمَنِ الْبَلَاءَ
enWisdom: One who wishes ill for the people will not remain safe from affliction
One who is vile, [the occasion of] his birth is evil
